GSD.description:
video: fbdev: sm712fb: Fix crash in smtcfb_write()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit b1c28577529cdfad40c8242673285f1e1e4c314e. For more details please see the references link.
